item.title: AERA 2023 Conference Activity
item.description: Early Career Scholar Award, from the Technology as an Agent of Change in Teaching & Learning (TACTL) SIG Discussant: Teacher Use of Social Media for Teaching and Professional Development (4/13/23) Presentation 1 - I Wanna Go Where Nobody Knows My Name: Affinity and Anonymity in the r/Teachers Subreddit (Hunhui Na & Bret Staudt Willet)
